message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm asking $160 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe it has great value, but my budget is limited. Would you consider lowering the price to $140?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $140 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $150?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I understand the value of the product, but I can only offer $145. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
